channel.title: Rscience
channel.description:
[size=12pt]RSCience[/size]
This is basically a log of what I am currently doing, I will be attaching screen-shots for relevance. Hope you all enjoy, please feel free to ask anything or criticise in a mature manner.
[b]16/01/2011[/b]
Edited Client [IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy209/LJDuckfield/Client_SS1.png[/img]
Added New Starting items [IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy209/LJDuckfield/Inventory_start_SS1.png[/img]
Added Lumbridge Bank (Temporary building) [IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy209/LJDuckfield/Banker_Lumbrige_SS1.png[/img]
Added Makeover mage to Lumbridge [IMG]http://i792.photobucket.com/albums/yy209/LJDuckfield/Makeover_Lumbridge_SS1.png[/img]
[b]17/01/2011[/b]
Changed Makeover Mage price from 3k - 100gp
Added multi action loop for Mining, Woodcutting, Fishing
Changed ::stuck spawn location & Death spawn location
[b]18/01/2011[/b]
Changed Makeover mage in Lumbridge. Gave him a nice hut to keep him moderately happy.
[IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa432/rscience1/noroofs_lumb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1197.photobucket.com/albums/aa432/rscience1/roofs_lumb.png[/img]

item.title: Rscience
item.dc:creator: @freaky5000 freaky5000
item.description:
@freaky5000 wrote:

I actually love how this guy is trying to troll everybody, showing how “epic” his grammar is. Truth be told what kind of fuck-tard puts a capital letter on the second word of a sentence. I suggest you re-evaluate your technique at making friends on thus note I shall fuck off.

Best Regards.

clemantine:

nice spelling guy

Nice grammar, you wanker.

Read full topic

item.title: Rscience
item.dc:creator: @The_AFKer The_AFKer
item.description:
@The_AFKer wrote:

[quote=“nwehrman11, post:22, topic:378715”]From what I have noticed, about 90 percent of the people that post in the RSC server advertisement section are nerds and d bags who troll and flame everyone who posts a new server like you did, so I don’t blame you for not posting due to lack of mature interest.

I, on the other hand, think your doing a good job and am looking forward to the updates and things that you post in the future. Have you put any thought into things such as what xp rate you will have? Is it going to be more of a skilling/all around server or more of a pking and staking server? If you need anyone to help test anything or try and finds bugs or anything in the server hit me up and I would be glad to help.[/quote]

I agree, I think he is doing a great job as well. The owner has showed he is learning and is fully able to run this server in due time, I look forward to his updates!

Read full topic

item.title: Rscience
item.dc:creator: @nwehrman11 nwehrman11
item.description:
@nwehrman11 wrote:

From what I have noticed, about 90 percent of the people that post in the RSC server advertisement section are nerds and d bags who troll and flame everyone who posts a new server like you did, so I don’t blame you for not posting due to lack of mature interest.

I, on the other hand, think your doing a good job and am looking forward to the updates and things that you post in the future. Have you put any thought into things such as what xp rate you will have? Is it going to be more of a skilling/all around server or more of a pking and staking server? If you need anyone to help test anything or try and finds bugs or anything in the server hit me up and I would be glad to help.

Read full topic

item.title: Rscience
item.dc:creator: @clemantine clemantine
item.description:
@clemantine wrote:

[quote=“T3mp3st, post:20, topic:378715”]please everyone who wants to flame this guy go stick your head in the ground?

I can see there’s not a lot done, but there’s always a place to start![/quote]

At the moment I have switched base sources, I have basically stopped posting due lack of mature interest.
Work is still proceeding at a nice pace. I’ve never worked on a project of this manner, and I am thoroughly enjoying
the learning curve.

I do aim to release this server for users to connect, I am running tests with my brother 23 miles away so i know incoming connections are being allowed =)

Thanks for your interest

Read full topic

item.title: Rscience
item.dc:creator: @clemantine clemantine
item.description:
@clemantine wrote:

Im not looking to be flamed or trolled, and would much prefer criticism that can aide me in future.

I have no previous java experience or Xml experience. And would like to make something that can possibly be given back to the community in the end.

Thankyou

Read full topic

item.title: Rscience
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

[quote=“clemantine, post:5, topic:378715”]I do not understand your choice of language, please try to re-phrase this in a manner I may understand. e.g -English

EDIT - SEE First Post[/quote]

Fair enough.

Since you want to pretend you didn’t know what I meant…

I meant to say that you’ve done nothing but change some numbers.

Plus, what you’ve completed so far would take roughly five minutes to complete.

Read full topic

item.title: Rscience
item.dc:creator: @clemantine clemantine
item.description:
@clemantine wrote:

I am glad to see you understand what you believe to be English, Give Constructive criticism next time please.

Quoted from Moparscape Rules
Rule 2:
Everybody is equal, don’t treat people worse than you do others(E.G., don’t isolate someone and flame them).

Rule 3:
Posts should be knowledgeable, try to put some effort into them, it’ll save hassle and stop you from looking like an idiot.

Rule 12:
We respect each other and other communities. We do not flame. There is to be no fighting on the forums.

Read full topic
